name: CUSTOM Featured products #3
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@7/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius

  assign body_layout = section.settings.body_layout
  assign body_layout_mobile = section.settings.body_layout_mobile
  assign body_gap = section.settings.body_gap
  assign body_gap_mobile = section.settings.body_gap_mobile
  
  assign content_align = section.settings.content_align
  assign content_align_mobile = section.settings.content_align_mobile

  assign content_horizontal_align = ""
  if content_align == "center"
    assign content_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif content_align == "right"
    assign content_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign content_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if content_align_mobile == "center"
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif content_align_mobile == "right"
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif

  assign heading_custom = section.settings.heading_custom
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_accent_custom = section.settings.heading_accent_custom
  assign heading_accent_font = section.settings.heading_accent_font
  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_size_mobile = section.settings.heading_size_mobile
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height
  assign heading_color = section.settings.heading_color
  assign heading_accent_color = section.settings.heading_accent_color

  assign product_desc_custom = section.settings.product_desc_custom
  assign product_desc_font = section.settings.product_desc_font
  assign product_desc_size = section.settings.product_desc_size
  assign product_desc_size_mobile = section.settings.product_desc_size_mobile
  assign product_desc_height = section.settings.product_desc_height
  assign product_desc_color = section.settings.product_desc_color  
  assign product_desc_mt = section.settings.product_desc_mt
  assign product_desc_mt_mobile = section.settings.product_desc_mt_mobile
  assign product_desc_length = section.settings.product_desc_length

  assign table_mt = section.settings.table_mt  
  assign table_mt_mobile = section.settings.table_mt_mobile
  assign table_border_thickness = section.settings.table_border_thickness
  assign table_border_color = section.settings.table_border_color
  
  assign column_title_custom = section.settings.column_title_custom
  assign column_title_font = section.settings.column_title_font
  assign column_title_size = section.settings.column_title_size
  assign column_title_size_mobile = section.settings.column_title_size_mobile
  assign column_title_height = section.settings.column_title_height
  assign column_title_color = section.settings.column_title_color  
  assign column_title_mb = section.settings.column_title_mb
  assign column_title_mb_mobile = section.settings.column_title_mb_mobile

  assign value_custom = section.settings.value_custom
  assign value_font = section.settings.value_font
  assign value_size = section.settings.value_size
  assign value_size_mobile = section.settings.value_size_mobile
  assign value_height = section.settings.value_height
  assign value_color = section.settings.value_color  
  assign value_padding_horizontal = section.settings.value_padding_horizontal
  assign value_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.value_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign value_padding_vertical = section.settings.value_padding_vertical
  assign value_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.value_padding_vertical_mobile

  assign slide_radius = section.settings.slide_radius
  assign slide_border_thickness = section.settings.slide_border_thickness
  assign slide_border_color = section.settings.slide_border_color
  assign slide_shadow = section.settings.slide_shadow
  
  assign slide_content_padding_horizontal = section.settings.slide_content_padding_horizontal
  assign slide_content_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.slide_content_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign slide_content_padding_vertical = section.settings.slide_content_padding_vertical
  assign slide_content_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.slide_content_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign slide_content_radius = section.settings.slide_content_radius
  assign slide_content_bg_color = section.settings.slide_content_bg_color
  assign slide_content_border_thickness = section.settings.slide_content_border_thickness
  assign slide_border_color = section.settings.slide_border_color

  assign slide_title_custom = section.settings.slide_title_custom
  assign slide_title_font = section.settings.slide_title_font
  assign slide_title_size = section.settings.slide_title_size
  assign slide_title_size_mobile = section.settings.slide_title_size_mobile
  assign slide_title_height = section.settings.slide_title_height
  assign slide_title_color = section.settings.slide_title_color  
  assign slide_title_hover_color = section.settings.slide_title_hover_color
  assign slide_title_align = section.settings.slide_title_align
  assign slide_title_align_mobile = section.settings.slide_title_align_mobile

  assign button_padding_horizontal = section.settings.button_padding_horizontal
  assign button_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.button_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign button_padding_vertical = section.settings.button_padding_vertical
  assign button_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.button_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign button_radius = section.settings.button_radius
  assign button_border_thickness = section.settings.button_border_thickness
  assign button_border_color = section.settings.button_border_color
  assign button_border_hover_color = section.settings.button_border_hover_color
  assign button_bg_color = section.settings.button_bg_color
  assign button_bg_hover_color = section.settings.button_bg_hover_color
  assign button_mt = section.settings.button_mt
  assign button_mt_mobile = section.settings.button_mt_mobile
  assign button_text = section.settings.button_text
  assign button_soldout_text = section.settings.button_soldout_text
  assign button_text_custom = section.settings.button_text_custom
  assign button_text_font = section.settings.button_text_font
  assign button_text_size = section.settings.button_text_size
  assign button_text_size_mobile = section.settings.button_text_size_mobile
  assign button_text_height = section.settings.button_text_height
  assign button_text_color = section.settings.button_text_color  
  assign button_text_hover_color = section.settings.button_text_hover_color

  assign button_price_custom = section.settings.button_price_custom
  assign button_price_font = section.settings.button_price_font
  assign button_price_size = section.settings.button_price_size
  assign button_price_size_mobile = section.settings.button_price_size_mobile
  assign button_price_height = section.settings.button_price_height
  assign button_price_color = section.settings.button_price_color  
  assign button_price_hover_color = section.settings.button_price_hover_color

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_radius = section.settings.arrow_radius
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile
  assign arrow_hover_effect = section.settings.arrow_hover_effect
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{  heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  heading_accent_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}  
  {{  product_desc_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  column_title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  value_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  slide_title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  button_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{  button_price_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }} 

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .featured-body-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    gap: {{ body_gap_mobile }}px;
    align-items: center;    
  }

  .featured-content-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    grid-area: content;
  }

  .featured-content-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: {{ content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
  }

  .featured-content-{{ section.id }}.active {
    display: flex;
  }

  .featured-heading-wrap-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 12px;
    justify-content: {{ content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
  }
  
  .featured-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ heading_color }};
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    text-align: {{ content_align_mobile }};
    font-weight: 700;
    word-break: break-word;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .featured-heading-accent-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ heading_accent_color }};
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    text-align: {{ content_align_mobile }};
    font-weight: 700;
    word-break: break-word;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .featured-content-desc-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ product_desc_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .featured-content-desc-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ product_desc_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ product_desc_color }};
    line-height: {{ product_desc_height }}%;
    text-align: {{ content_align_mobile }};
    word-break: break-word;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .featured-features-list-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 0.5fr 1fr;
    align-items: center;
    width: 100%;
  }

  .featured-table-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    margin-top: {{ table_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .featured-table-row-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: stretch;
  }

  .featured-table-row-{{ section.id }}:first-child {
    margin-bottom: {{ column_title_mb_mobile }}px;
  }

  .featured-table-row-{{ section.id }}:first-child .featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
    padding-left: {{ value_padding_horizontal_mobile | plus: table_border_thickness }}px;
  }

  .featured-table-row-{{ section.id }}:not(:last-child):not(:first-child) {
    border-bottom: {{ table_border_thickness }}px solid {{ table_border_color }};
  }

  .featured-table-item-{{ section.id }} {
    flex: 1 0;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
  }

  .featured-table-row-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) .featured-table-item-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: {{ value_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ value_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
  }

  .featured-table-row-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) .featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}:not(:last-child) {
    border-right: {{ table_border_thickness }}px solid {{ table_border_color }};
  }

  .featured-table-row-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) .featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}:first-child {
    padding-left: 0px;
  }

  .featured-table-row-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) .featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}:last-child {
    padding-right: 0px;
  }

  .featured-column-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: {{ column_title_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ column_title_color }};
    line-height: {{ column_title_height }}%;
    word-break: break-word;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .featured-value-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ value_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ value_color }};
    line-height: {{ value_height }}%;  
    word-break: break-word;
    text-transform: unset;
  }

  .featured-column-{{ section.id }}:last-child .featured-value-{{ section.id }} {
    border-right: 0;
  }

  .featured-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    grid-area: slider;
    padding: 100px 0px !important;
    margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;    
  }

  .featured-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    min-width: 0px;
  }

  .featured-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    border: {{ slide_border_thickness }}px solid {{ slide_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ slide_radius }}px;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
    overflow: hidden !important;
    height: auto !important;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-image-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block;
    position: relative;      
    width: 100%;
    aspect-ratio: 9.6/14;
  }

  .featured-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .featured-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover
  }

  .featured-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .featured-slide-content-{{ section.id }} {    
    position: absolute;
    bottom: -5px;
    left: -5px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    width: calc(100% + 10px);
    border: {{ slide_content_border_thickness }}px solid {{ slide_border_color }};
    background-color: {{ slide_content_bg_color }};
    border-radius: {{ slide_content_radius }}px;
    padding: {{ slide_content_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ slide_content_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    opacity: 0;
    pointer-events: none;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  } 

  .featured-slide-{{ section.id }}.swiper-slide-active {
    z-index: 1;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    scale: 1.3;
  }

  .featured-slide-{{ section.id }}.swiper-slide-active .featured-slide-content-{{ section.id }} {
    opacity: 1;
    pointer-events: all;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .featured-slide-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    width: 100%;    
    font-size: {{ slide_title_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ slide_title_color }};
    line-height: {{ slide_title_height }}%;    
    word-break: break-word;
    text-align: {{ slide_title_align_mobile }};
    text-transform: unset;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
  }
  .featured-slide-title-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    color: {{ slide_title_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }
  
  .featured-button-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 10px;
    width: 100%;
    margin-top: {{ button_mt_mobile }}px;    
    padding: {{ button_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ button_radius }}px;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    background-color: {{ button_bg_color }};
    border: {{ button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ button_border_color }};
    text-decoration: none;
  }

  .featured-button-{{ section.id }}.disabled {
    opacity: 0.7;
    cursor: not-allowed;
  }

  .featured-button-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    background-color: {{ button_bg_hover_color }};
    border-color: {{ button_border_hover_color }};
  }

  .featured-button-text-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: {{ button_text_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ button_text_color }};
    line-height: {{ button_text_height }}%;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    word-break: break-word;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-wrap: nowrap;
  }

  .featured-button-{{ section.id }}:hover .featured-button-text-{{ section.id }} {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    color: {{ button_text_hover_color }};
  }

  .featured-button-price-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ button_price_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ button_price_color }};
    line-height: {{ button_price_height }}%;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    word-break: break-word;
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-wrap: nowrap;
  }

  .featured-button-{{ section.id }}:hover .featured-button-price-{{ section.id }} {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    color: {{ button_price_hover_color }};
  }
 
  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;    
    z-index: 1; 
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: 0px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ arrow_radius }}px;
    background: transparent;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    transform: scale(1) translateY(-50%);
    /* box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,.15); */
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} {
    left: 15%;
  }

  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    right: 15%;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon {
    pointer-events: none;
    place-items: center;
    display: grid;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    transform: rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-style: solid;
    border: 0px;
    border-right: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-top: 2px solid currentColor;
    position: relative;
    left: -1px;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    left: unset;
    right: -1px;
    border-right: 0px;
    border-top: 0px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-left: 2px solid currentColor;
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    height: 1.6px;
    transform-origin: center;
    opacity: 0;
    background: currentColor;
    transform: scaleX(.5);
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} span,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} span {
    color: {{ arrow_color }};
  }

  .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0.5;
  }

  @media(min-width: 768px) {
    .featured-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: 160px 0px !important;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;    
    }
  }

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .featured-body-{{ section.id }} {
      gap: {{ body_gap }}px;  
    }
        
    .featured-content-{{ section.id }} {
      justify-content: {{ content_horizontal_align }};
    }

    .featured-heading-wrap-{{ section.id }} {
      justify-content: {{ content_horizontal_align }};
    }

    .featured-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ content_align }};
      font-size: {{ heading_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-heading-accent-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ heading_size }}px;
      text-align: {{ content_align }};
    }

    .featured-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: 105px 0px !important;
      margin-left: 0rem !important;
      margin-right: 0rem !important; 
    }

    .featured-content-desc-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ product_desc_mt }}px;
    }

    .featured-content-desc-{{ section.id }} * {
      text-align: {{ content_align }};
      font-size: {{ product_desc_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-table-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ table_mt }}px;
    }

    .featured-table-row-{{ section.id }}:first-child {
      margin-bottom: {{ column_title_mb }}px;
    }

    .featured-table-row-{{ section.id }}:first-child .featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
      padding-left: {{ value_padding_horizontal | plus: table_border_thickness }}px;
    }

    .featured-column-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ column_title_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-table-row-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) .featured-table-item-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ value_padding_vertical }}px {{ value_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .featured-table-row-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) .featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}:first-child {
      padding-left: 0px;
    }
  
    .featured-table-row-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) .featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}:last-child {
      padding-right: 0px;
    }

    .featured-value-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ value_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-slide-content-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ slide_content_padding_vertical }}px {{ slide_content_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .featured-slide-title-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ slide_title_align }};
      font-size: {{ slide_title_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-button-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ button_mt }}px;    
      padding: {{ button_padding_vertical }}px {{ button_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .featured-button-text-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ button_text_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-button-price-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ button_price_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }

    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    }

    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    }   

  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .featured-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ heading_font.family }}, {{ heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if heading_accent_custom %}
  <style>
    .featured-heading-accent-{{ section.id }}  {
      font-family: {{ heading_accent_font.family }}, {{ heading_accent_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ heading_accent_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ heading_accent_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if product_desc_custom %}
  <style>
     .featured-content-desc-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ product_desc_font.family }}, {{ product_desc_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ product_desc_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ product_desc_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if column_title_custom %}
  <style>
    .featured-column-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ column_title_font.family }}, {{ column_title_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ column_title_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ column_title_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if value_custom %}
  <style>
    .featured-value-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ value_font.family }}, {{ value_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ value_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ value_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if slide_title_custom %}
  <style>
    .featured-slide-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ slide_title_font.family }}, {{ slide_title_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ slide_title_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ slide_title_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if button_text_custom %}
  <style>
    .featured-button-text-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ button_text_font.family }}, {{ button_text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ button_text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ button_text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if button_price_custom %}
  <style>
    .featured-button-price-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ button_price_font.family }}, {{ button_price_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ button_price_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ button_price_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if body_layout_mobile == "slider_content" %}
  <style>
    .featured-body-{{ section.id }} {
      grid-template-columns: 1fr;
      grid-template-areas: 
        "slider" 
        "content"; 
      height: 100%;
    }
  </style>
{% else %} 
  {% if body_layout_mobile == "content_slider" %}
    <style>
      .featured-body-{{ section.id }} {
        grid-template-columns: 1fr;
        grid-template-areas: 
          "content" 
          "slider";    
        height: 100%;
      }
    </style>
  {% endif %}  
{% endif %}

{% if body_layout == "slider_content" %}
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-body-{{ section.id }} {
        grid-template-columns: 0.7fr {{ section.settings.slider_width | divided_by: 10.0 }}fr;
        grid-template-areas: "slider content";
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}  
  {% if body_layout == "content_slider" %}
    <style>
      @media (min-width: 1024px) {
        .featured-body-{{ section.id }} {
          grid-template-columns: {{ section.settings.slider_width | divided_by: 10.0 }}fr 0.7fr ;
          grid-template-areas: "content slider";
        }
      }
    </style>
  {% endif %}  
{% endif %}

{% if slide_shadow %}
  <style>   
    .featured-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      box-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04) 0px 3px 5px;
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-slider-{{ section.id }} {
        padding-left: 8px !important;
        padding-right: 8px !important;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_hover_effect == "color" %}
  <style>
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
      border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
      background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};
    }
  
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon {
      color: {{ arrow_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "scale" %}
  <style>
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transform: scale(0.9) translateY(-50%);
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
      .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
        transform: scale(0.9) translateY(-50%);
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "arrow" %}
  <style>
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
  
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(-1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
    
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after,
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: scaleX(1);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: block;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: block;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
      .featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% comment %} PREVIEW {% endcomment %}
<style>
  .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .swiper-wrapper {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    overflow: hidden; 
    padding: 60px 0px !important;   
  }

  .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .featured-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
  }

  .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .featured-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
    margin-left: 0px;
  } 

  .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .featured-slide-{{ section.id }}:nth-child(2) {
    z-index: 1;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    scale: 1.3;
  }

  .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .featured-slide-{{ section.id }}:nth-child(2) .featured-slide-content-{{ section.id }} {
    opacity: 1;
    pointer-events: all;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {
    .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .featured-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
      margin-left: 0px;
    } 

    .featured-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .featured-slide-{{ section.id }} {
      width: calc(100% / 3);
    }
  }
</style>

<div class="section-{{ section.id }} feature-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      <div class="featured-body-{{ section.id }}">
        <div class="featured-content-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">               
          {% assign inside_item = false %}              
          {% for block in section.blocks %}
            {% if block.type == 'slide' %}                                                    
              {% if inside_item %}                
                </div>
              {% endif %}
              <div class="featured-content-{{ section.id }} {% if forloop.first %}active{% endif %}" data-id="{{ block.id }}">   
                <div class="featured-heading-wrap-{{ section.id }}">
                  {% if block.settings.heading_accent %}
                    <p class="featured-heading-accent-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.heading_accent }}</p>                    
                  {% endif %} 
                  {% if block.settings.heading != blank %}       
                    <h2 class="featured-heading-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.heading }}</h2>  
                  {% endif %}   
                </div>                        
                <div class="featured-content-desc-{{ section.id }}">
                  {% if block.settings.custom_desc != blank %}
                    {{ block.settings.custom_desc }}
                  {% elsif block.settings.product.description != blank %}
                    <p>{{ block.settings.product.description | strip_html | truncatewords: product_desc_length }}</p>    
                  {% endif %}              
                </div>
                {% assign inside_item = true %}                   
            {% elsif block.type == 'table' %}                
              <div class="featured-table-{{ section.id }}">
                <div class="featured-table-row-{{ section.id }} featured-table-row-{{ block.id }}">
                  {% if block.settings.first_heading != blank %}
                    <div class="featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                      <p class="featured-column-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.first_heading }}</p>
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
                  {% if block.settings.second_heading != blank %}
                    <div class="featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                      <p class="featured-column-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.second_heading }}</p>
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
                  {% if block.settings.third_heading != blank %}
                    <div class="featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                      <p class="featured-column-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.third_heading }}</p>
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
                  {% if block.settings.four_heading != blank %}
                    <div class="featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                      <p class="featured-column-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.four_heading }}</p>
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}
                </div>
                {% if block.settings.first_heading_first_value != blank or block.settings.second_heading_first_value != blank or block.settings.third_heading_first_value != blank or block.settings.four_heading_first_value != blank %}
                  <div class="featured-table-row-{{ section.id }} featured-table-row-{{ block.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.first_heading_first_value != blank %}
                      <div class="featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                        <p class="featured-value-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.first_heading_first_value }}</p>
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.second_heading_first_value != blank %}
                      <div class="featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                        <p class="featured-value-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.second_heading_first_value }}</p>
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.third_heading_first_value != blank %}
                      <div class="featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                        <p class="featured-value-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.third_heading_first_value }}</p>
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.four_heading_first_value != blank %}
                      <div class="featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                        <p class="featured-value-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.four_heading_first_value }}</p>
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                  </div>
                {% endif %}
                {% if block.settings.first_heading_second_value != blank or block.settings.second_heading_second_value != blank or block.settings.third_heading_second_value != blank or block.settings.four_heading_second_value != blank %}
                  <div class="featured-table-row-{{ section.id }} featured-table-row-{{ block.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.first_heading_second_value != blank %}
                      <div class="featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                        <p class="featured-value-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.first_heading_second_value }}</p>
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.second_heading_second_value != blank %}
                      <div class="featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                        <p class="featured-value-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.second_heading_second_value }}</p>
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.third_heading_second_value != blank %}
                      <div class="featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                        <p class="featured-value-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.third_heading_second_value }}</p>
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.four_heading_second_value != blank %}
                      <div class="featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                        <p class="featured-value-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.four_heading_second_value }}</p>
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                  </div>
                {% endif %}
                {% if block.settings.first_heading_third_value != blank or block.settings.second_heading_third_value != blank or block.settings.third_heading_third_value != blank or block.settings.four_heading_third_value != blank %}
                  <div class="featured-table-row-{{ section.id }} featured-table-row-{{ block.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.first_heading_third_value != blank %}
                      <div class="featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                        <p class="featured-value-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.first_heading_third_value }}</p>
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.second_heading_third_value != blank %}
                      <div class="featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                        <p class="featured-value-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.second_heading_third_value }}</p>
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.third_heading_third_value != blank %}
                      <div class="featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                        <p class="featured-value-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.third_heading_third_value }}</p>
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.four_heading_third_value != blank %}
                      <div class="featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                        <p class="featured-value-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.four_heading_third_value }}</p>
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                  </div>
                {% endif %}
                {% if block.settings.first_heading_four_value != blank or block.settings.second_heading_four_value != blank or block.settings.third_heading_four_value != blank or block.settings.four_heading_four_value != blank %}
                  <div class="featured-table-row-{{ section.id }} featured-table-row-{{ block.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.first_heading_four_value != blank %}
                      <div class="featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                        <p class="featured-value-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.first_heading_four_value }}</p>
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.second_heading_four_value != blank %}
                      <div class="featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                        <p class="featured-value-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.second_heading_four_value }}</p>
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.third_heading_four_value != blank %}
                      <div class="featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                        <p class="featured-value-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.third_heading_four_value }}</p>
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% if block.settings.four_heading_four_value != blank %}
                      <div class="featured-table-item-{{ section.id }}">
                        <p class="featured-value-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.four_heading_four_value }}</p>
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                  </div>
                {% endif %}
              </div>  
            {% endif %}            
          {% endfor %}   
          {% if inside_item %}
            </div>
          {% endif %}     
        </div>
        <div class="featured-slider-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
          <div class="featured-slider-{{ section.id }} preview swiper">
            <div class="swiper-wrapper">
              {% for block in section.blocks %}
                {% if block.type == 'slide' %}
                  <div class="featured-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide" id="{{ block.id }}">
                    <{% if block.settings.product.url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.product.url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="featured-image-{{ section.id }}">               
                      {% if block.settings.product.featured_image != blank %}
                        <img src="{{ block.settings.product.featured_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.product.featured_image.alt }}" {% if lazy %}loading="lazy"{% endif %}>               
                      {% else %}    
                        {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                      {% endif %}
                    </{% if block.settings.product.url != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>   
                    <div class="featured-slide-content-{{ section.id }}">              
                      {% if block.settings.product.title %}
                        <h3 class="featured-slide-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.product.title }}</h3>
                      {% else %}
                        <h3 class="featured-slide-title-{{ section.id }}">Product title</h3>  
                      {% endif %}
                      {% if button_text %}
                        <{% if block.settings.product.url != blank and block.settings.product.available %}a href="{{ block.settings.product.url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="featured-button-{{ section.id }} {% unless block.settings.product.available %}disabled{% endunless %}">
                          {% if block.settings.product.selected_or_first_available_variant.available == false %}
                            <p class="featured-button-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ button_soldout_text }}</p>
                          {% else %}
                            <p class="featured-button-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ button_text }}</p>  
                            <p class="featured-button-price-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.product.price | money }}</p>
                          {% endif %}                       
                        </{% if block.settings.product.url != blank and block.settings.product.available %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>
                      {% endif %}
                    </div>           
                  </div>
                {% endif %}                
              {% endfor %}
            </div>           
            <button class="featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
              <span class="animate-icon"></span>
            </button>                     
            <button class="featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
              <span class="animate-icon"></span>
            </button>                    
          </div>
        </div>       
      </div>
      
    </div>
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@7/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initFeaturedProducts3() {
    document.querySelector('.featured-slider-{{ section.id }}').classList.remove('preview')
    const slider = new Swiper(".featured-slider-{{ section.id }}", {
      speed: 300,
      centeredSlides: true,
      loop: true,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.featured-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
        prevEl: '.featured-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}',
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          slidesPerView: 1.5,
        },
        768: {
          slidesPerView: 1.5,
        },
        1024: {
          slidesPerView: 3,
          spaceBetween: 14,
        }
      }
    });

    const leftItems = document.querySelectorAll('.featured-content-{{ section.id }}');

    function updateActiveLeftContent() {
      const activeSlide = slider.slides[slider.activeIndex];
      const activeId = activeSlide.getAttribute('id');

      leftItems.forEach(left => {
        if (left.getAttribute('data-id') === activeId) {
          left.classList.add('active');
        } else {
          left.classList.remove('active');
        }
      });
    }
    slider.on('slideChange', updateActiveLeftContent);
    updateActiveLeftContent();
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initFeaturedProducts3);

  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initFeaturedProducts3);
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initFeaturedProducts3);
  }
</script>

slider_width.label: Slider width ratio
slider_width.description: Controls how much space the slider takes up on desktop

heading_accent_custom.label: Use custom font for the pretext
heading_accent_custom.description: Use custom font for the pretext

background_gradient.label: Section background gradient
background_gradient.description: Remove gradient to replace with solid colors

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
